page.description: Reset the user's password to a generated password.
page.discussion: Context.Security.AdministrativeResetPassword() reset the user's password to a generated password. This method can be used whether or not a password answer is required so its use should be limited to pages/code that require administrative access. The return value is the newly generated password. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
